Module com.inventorysystem
Package com.inventorysystem

Class modifyPartFormController

java.lang.Object
com.inventorysystem.modifyPartFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class modifyPartFormController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller for the modifyPart page. This is the method that runs when the modifyPart page is opened.
Author:
Carlos Rodriguez

  • Constructor Details

    • modifyPartFormController

      public modifyPartFormController()

  • Method Details

    • changeText

      public void changeText​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This method changes the label for Machine ID to Company Name and vice-versa. Depending on which radio button is selected, will determine the text displayed next to the text field.

    • switchToMainForm

      public void switchToMainForm​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws java.io.IOException
      The cancel button returns you to the main page. Once pressed the user will return to the main page and not save any new information.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • addInHouse

      public static void addInHouse​(InHouse newInHouse)
      This method adds a Part to the InHouse list. The purpose of this method is to change a part from Outsourced to InHouse.
      Parameters:
      newInHouse - This is the Part to accept the new state.

    • addOutsourced

      public static void addOutsourced​(Outsourced newOutsourced)
      This method adds a Part to the Outsourced list. The purpose of this method is to change a part from InHouse to Outsourced
      Parameters:
      newOutsourced - This is the Part to accept the new state.

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method fills out all the text fields on the modifyPart page. On initialization the method will grab data from the selected Part from the main page and fill out all the text fields.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • loadRadioInfoInHouse

      public int loadRadioInfoInHouse​(int i)
      This method gets the machine ID that belongs to a part with the matching id. The InHouse list is iterated through to find the matching Part to retrieve its machine ID data.
      Parameters:
      i - the id from the Part entered that will be searched for.
      Returns:
      Returns the machine ID.

    • loadRadioInfoOutsourced

      public java.lang.String loadRadioInfoOutsourced​(int i)
      This method gets the company name that belongs to a part with the matching id. The Outsourced list is iterated through to find the matching Part to retrieve its company name data.
      Parameters:
      i - the id from the Part entered that will be searched for.
      Returns:
      Returns the company name.

    • deleteInHouse

      public void deleteInHouse​(int i)
      This method removes the Part from the InHouse list. The selected part is added to a temporary list that is later used to remove from the original list. RUNTIME ERROR an error that occured was the NullPointerException. This was resolved by creating a temporary array list, rather than altering the target array list while iterating through it.
      Parameters:
      i - the id from the Part entered that will be removed.

    • deleteOutsourced

      public void deleteOutsourced​(int i)
      This method removes the Part from the Outsourced list. The selected part is added to a temporary list that is later used to remove from the original list. RUNTIME ERROR an error that occured was the NullPointerException. This was resolved by creating a temporary array list, rather than altering the target array list while iterating through it.
      Parameters:
      i - the id from the Part entered that will be removed.

    • saveBtn

      public void saveBtn​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws java.io.IOException
      The save button returns you to the main page and adds to the Part table. Once pressed this method will run multiple checks to verify the input before adding to the Part table and then return the user to the main page.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
